item.title: Musk’s DOGE sets up conflict-of-interest clash for billionaire
item.description: Trump’s unprecedented use of a rare type of government agency — never before used outside the national security realm — solved one problem for Musk.

item.title: Nike’s new CEO aspired to the corner office. Here’s why that matters
item.description: Nike's new CEO always wanted the corner office role. He got it.

item.title: Bill Gates is a fan of DOGE if it means curbing government debt—he says they’ll have to tackle pensions, defense and healthcare
item.description: Bill Gates says he's on board with Elon Musk's cost-cutting plans for DOGE as long as the U.S. government doesn't lose sight of its value system.

item.title: Why retired CEOs keep coming back
item.description: Also: Wall Street: Trump’s rate cut demands are unlikely, Trump shrugs off Musk’s Stargate criticism.

item.title: Spotify inks multi-year deal with Universal Music, its first major publisher agreement since controversial ‘bundle’ rollout
item.description: The Mechanical Licensing Collective sued Spotify over the 'bundle' issue, saying the company was grossly underpaying songwriters, composers and publis...
